summary: Following on from Heartwood Keep, a complimenting village.
descriptionHtml:
This is a village I've created, Riften style, mainly to compliment Heartwood Keep[b]. [/b]I have included Heartwood Keep
in the installer, and will be maintaining that from this archive as from now.
The installer will give the options to install either the Village or the Keep, or both.

[b][i][color=#ffff00]CHECK TO ENSURE CORRECT LOAD ORDER[/color] if installing both Village and Keep:[/i][/b]
Heartwood Keep > Heartwood > HeartwoodKeepVillagePatch.


[b][i]
[font=Georgia][color=#f6b26b][size=6][center]Heartwood[/center][/size][/color][/font][color=#00ff00]LOCATION:[/color]
[/i][/b]Located just a stone's throw away from Heartwood Mill in Rifthold with beautiful lakeside surroundings.
[b][i]
[color=#00ff00]FEATURES:[/color][/i][/b]
 Automatic lighting - day/night cycle
 Automatic closing farm gates
 An Inn
 A fully equipped Blacksmith
 A general Trader
 Stables with Stable Master
 A crop farm
 An animal farm
 Pineview - A comfy player home with room for 2 followers
 Key for Pineview is in the barrel. :)
 Alchemy and Enchanting stations in the player home
 Resident Bard in the Inn
 Resident follower in the Inn
 Two guards each on a double 6-hour shift to protect the village
 Patchy the horse

[b][i][color=#00ff00]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
[/i][/b] None for the village

[i][b][color=#00ff00]OPTIONAL:[/color][/b]
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores by Harvey2112[/url] - [/i]For automatic storage and sorting.

[color=#00ff00]RECOMMENDED MODS:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7241/?]Sexy Riften v2 by Horrorview[/url] for a really nice look to the village.



[b][i][font=Georgia][color=#f6b26b][size=6][center]
Heartwood Keep[/center][/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][b][color=#00ff00][i]LOCATION:[/i][/color][/b]
 Located just a stone's throw away from Heartwood Village in Rifthold with beautiful lakeside surroundings.
 A key is required to enter. Look for something unusual around the keep that will lead you to it...

[b][color=#00ff00][i]FEATURES:[/i][/color][/b]
 Automatic lighting - day/night cycle
 Automatic closing gates
 Unique trophy displays
 Single area for all crafting
 Sleeps 9 followers
 Adoption friendly with room for 6 kids
 Housekeeper/Merchant with 25k gold
 Automatic storage with General Stores

[i][b][color=#00ff00]REQUIREMENTS:[/color][/b][/i]
 Hearthfires DLC

[i][b][color=#00ff00]OPTIONAL:[/color][/b]
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores by Harvey2112[/url] - [/i]For automatic storage and sorting.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix[/url] - Heartwood Keep adoption stuff is built around this so, pretty much required for kids.
 Dawnguard DLC - Dragonborn DLC
 NMM installation will offer the option to install additional material if you have the DLCs
 They both provide additional trophy displays for the respective DLCs

[i][b][color=#00ff00]RECOMMENDED MODS:[/color][/b][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7241/?]Sexy Riften v2 by Horrorview[/url] - for a really nice makeover
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing by Dovahklon[/url] - [/size][size=2]to make followers use all floor levels
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home is Your Home by Volek[/url][i] - [/i]Excellent mod for making followers sandbox in multiple areas
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50954/?]Sleep Tight by Isoku[/url][i] - [/i]Forces NPCs to strip to sleepwear or nude when sleeping
[/size]
[b][i][b][i][color=#00ff00]CREDITS:[/color][/i][/b][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores by Harvey2112[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17423/?]Paintings and Frames by Artisanix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55891/?]Shadow1259 Resources by Shadow1259[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30602/?]Ingredients Wall Art Resource by Blary[/url]

[b][i][color=#00ff00]OTHER MODS:[/color][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55799/?]Riverwood Millhouse

[/url]
author: Urshy

files.name: Heartwood
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release for Heartwood Village
Updated the keep to display custom neutral banners.
Patched the village. the mill, and keep for compatibility.

files.name: Heartwood
files.changelogHtml:
General Stores no longer a requirement. Included as an optional install.
Added optional General Stores for Pineview player home.
Added containers to the Keep to replace the activators if General Stores is not installed.
Fixed incorrect light control link to lantern by guards sleeping quarters.
Added external light to rear of Pineview player home.

files.name: Heartwood
files.changelogHtml:
Removed duplicated navmesh layer which appeared after the heavy modification to change General Stores requirement.
Ensured neutrality for Heartwood Guards.
Decreased package times and added more idles to make the villagers appear busier.
Added some interaction between the Keep and village. Selena goes shopping and drinking. :)
Tidied up a few minor imperfections and filled the wells with water.

files.name: Heartwood
files.changelogHtml:
Pineview player house has had a small makeover internally and externally.
Heartwood Inn had a makeover at the same time.
A Bard has now taken permanent residence at Heartwood Inn.
Scrapped hireling Davos in favor of Carla the follower. Hireling stuff looks far too buggy to me.
